name: Neonwave space game feel prototype
description:
A simple game where you control a retro space ship on rails inspired by games as guitar hero and space invaders. The whole game has made to test my "game feel" skills with a neonwave style. KEYBOARD CONTROLS
  • MOVEMENT KEYS: A - D/Right arrow - Left arrow
  • SHOT KEY: Spacebar
